name: Hell's casino (whirlybirdman)
description:
After gambling away his life-savings, Ace has sold his soul to the devil to pay off his debt. As such he has now found himself trapped, working as a dealer at the infamous 'Hell's Casino', managed by the devil himself. Armed with the 'devil's dice' that he stole, Ace decides to take one last gamble and attempt an escape, taking on the demon hordes.

Controls:

  • wasd to move
  • left click to throw a die
  • right click to melee attack
  • use the melee attack to reroll your dice for different effects
  • the faces of your die are shown in the bottom left of the screen, each one has a unique effect
  • when you get an upgrade you can add more faces to your die by selecting an option with a border
  • be careful, some effects can damage you too
